name: Counter Ops: Blackout Assault
description:
Counter Ops: Blackout Assault is an action-packed FPS game where you battle global terrorists. Play as a commando soldier, complete all missions in different locations, and use every powerful weapon to do that. Defuse bombs, rescue hostages, and thwart enemy plans!

Features:

- over 20 unique missions
- 4 locations including cargo ship, smuggling tunnels, terrorist campsite and storage units
- 11 upgradable weapons with old-time classics like AK47 and MP5
- 6 secret missions
- Challenging time based objectives
- Immersive audio and sound effects

Neutralize terrorists in different regions, defusing bombs, rescuing hostages, and more. The clock is ticking, so act fast to earn highest reward!

As a commando, you'll face enemies head-on. Upgrade your arsenal, clear the desert of terrorists, and prove your skills. Engage in intense battles, use stealth or heavy firepower, and be the hero in Counter Ops: Blackout Assault!
